item.title: JSON Lines
item.description: Worked with the JSON Lines format the other day. It’s a CSV on steroids: each entry is a separate line, as in CSV; at the same time it is a full-fledged JSON. For example: { "id": 11, "name": "Alice", "department": { "id": 1001, "name": "it"} } { "id": 12, "name": "bob", "department": { "id": 1001, "name": "it"} } { "id": 21, "name": "Cindy", "department": { "id": 2001, "name": "hr"} } Great stuff:
